name: strand-currency
description: Numeric currency formatting. Defaults to locale for decimal format.

attributes.name: currency
attributes.description: The 3 letter currency code to use for conversion.

attributes.name: precision
attributes.description: The number of decimals to use for the fractional part of represented value

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The raw number to format for a given currency

attributes.name: locale
attributes.description: The locale to use for decimal formatting. Defaults to navigator.language.
